name: Shining Ammunition
desc: Shining Ammunition gives off a faint glow. When shot, it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius, and dim light to next 20 feet for the next 10 minutes. If it hits a target, it sticks to it, causing the target to shed light in the same radius. A creature can remove the ammunition with an interact action, but the ammunition itself continues to glow for the rest of the duration or until destroyed.

name: Antler Arrow
desc: Takes one action to activate. When an activated arrow hits a target, bone antlers extend to pin it down. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Reflex save or become stuck to the surface.

name: Merciful Balm
desc: Smelling strongly of herbs and pine resin, merciful balm is a thick sticky past that can be used to anoint a weapon, granting the weapon the nonlethal trait for 1 hour.

name: Nectar of Purification
desc: A shimmering liquid which, when poured over any food or drink, casts a 1st-rank cleanse cuisine spell. The nectar evaporates as it takes effect, leaving the taste and texture of the food or drink unaltered.

name: Healing Potion (Minor)
desc: A vial of ruby-red liquid that imparts a tingling sensation, as it rapidly heals the drinker for 1d8 Hit Points.
